text: huve-llezi ahrace-llezine keferu min ehli-lkitabi min diyarihim lievveli-lhasr. ma zanentum ey yahrucu vezannu ennehum mani`atuhum husunuhum mine-llahi feetahumu-llahu min haysu lem yahtesibu vekazefe fi kulubihimu-rru`be yuhribune buyutehum bieydihim veeydi-lmu'minine fa`tebiru ya uli-l'ebsar
